column2: ALPHA BLACK TO CHARLIE BLACK. YOU ARE CLEARED TO ENGAGE, OVER.
ALPHA TO BRAVO BLACK. YOU ARE WELCOME TO JOIN THE PARTY. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. OBJECTIVE ONE CLEARED AND SECURED. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE SECURED SECOND OBJECTIVE. OVER.
UNDERSTOOD ALPHA. ON OUR WAY. CHARLIE OUT.
THIS IS BRAVO. COPY THAT ALPHA, ROLLING IN NOW. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT. OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. UNDERSTOOD, GOOD WORK. OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME BACK. MISSION IS ACCOMPLISHED. OUT.
